package selenium_training;

import org.openqa.selenium.By;
import org.openqa.selenium.chrome.ChromeDriver;

public class Homework {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		ChromeDriver driverChrome = new ChromeDriver();
		driverChrome.get("https://auth.emag.ro/user/login");
		driverChrome.manage().window().maximize();

		// 2 locatori Tag Name + 2 alte locatore (ex. id sau name)
		driverChrome.findElement(By.id("user_login_email")).click();
		driverChrome.findElement(By.id("user_login_email")).sendKeys("harrypotter@gogwarts.com");
		driverChrome.findElement(By.tagName("button")).click();
	
	}

}
